required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Comparison of Two Crosslinked Hyaluronate for the Treatment of Osteoarthritis Pain
clinical_study.official_title: The Comparison of Safety and Effectiveness Between HYAJOINT Plus and Bioventus Durolane for the Treatment of Knee Osteoarthritis Pain

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study is to compare the safety and effectiveness between two BDDE-crosslinked hyaluronate, HYAJOINT Plus and Durolane, for the Treatment of Knee Osteoarthritis Pain.

primary_outcome.measure: The change from baseline VAS pain score at 6 months post-injection.
primary_outcome.description: The VAS scale uses a 100 mm line labelled at '0' with 'no pain' and '100' with 'worst pain'

secondary_outcome.measure: Visual analog scale (VAS) score for pain change
secondary_outcome.description: The change from baseline VAS pain score at 1, 3, 9 and 12 months post-injection. The VAS scale uses a 100 mm line labelled at '0' with 'no pain' and '100' with 'worst pain'

secondary_outcome.measure: Adverse events reported from the baseline and during the study period
secondary_outcome.description: The safety assessment was based on reports of adverse events, defined as any unwanted events whether it was thought to be related to the study drugs or not, were recorded during each follow up and at any time the patient reported an event to the investigator during the study period.

secondary_outcome.measure: The Western Ontario and McMaster Universities Osteoarthritis Index (WOMAC) Likert scale score change
secondary_outcome.description: The change from baseline WOMAC score at 1, 3, 6, 9 and 12 months post-injection. A 24-item questionnaire with 3 subscales measuring pain, stiffness, and physical function. Total score is 96 and lower scores indicate better outcomes.

secondary_outcome.measure: Visual analog scale (VAS) score for stiffness change
secondary_outcome.description: The change from baseline VAS stiffness score at 1, 3, 6, 9 and 12 months post-injection. The VAS scale uses a 100 mm line labelled at '0' with 'no stiffness' and '100' with 'worst stiffness'.

secondary_outcome.measure: Visual analog scale (VAS) score for satisfaction change
secondary_outcome.description: The change from baseline VAS satisfaction score at 1, 3, 6, 9 and 12 months post-injection. Patients rate their treatment satisfaction based on a 100 mm VAS. The VAS scale uses a 100 mm line labelled at '0' with 'least satisfaction' and '100' with 'highest satisfaction'.

The change from baseline TUG time at 1, 3, 6, 9 and 12 months post-injection. A simple measurement of time in seconds for a subject to rise from an armchair, walk 3 meters, turn around, walk back to the chair, and sit down.

The change from baseline SLS time at 1, 3, 6, 9 and 12 months post-injection. A simple measurement of time in seconds for a subject raising one foot up without touching it to the supported lower extremity with knee OA and maintain balance for as long as possible.

secondary_outcome.measure: Knee joint inflammatory state change by ultrasonic inspection
secondary_outcome.description: The change from baseline of the subject knee inflammatory state at 1, 3, 6, 9 and 12 months post-injection through ultrasonic inspection.

intervention.description: 60 mg / 3 ml cross-linked hyaluronan, SciVision Biotech Inc.
60 mg / 3 ml cross-linked hyaluronan, Bioventus LLC.
